name: MI6 Secret Agent
description: Do you have you enough courage to shoot all the gangsters and rescue your colleague from criminals’ hostage? Secret Mission Agent MI6 game is all about this. As a secret agent 07 you have to sneak into enemies’ place where they have kept another spy member. During this mission bond will face multiple challenges. Many spectre cameras are installed in the building which you have to break first so that you can get into the building. Then james have to hack gangsters’ computer to get information about their secret criminal activities.
